AI Description: r-multtest is an R package that provides multiple testing procedures for controlling the false discovery rate or family-wise error rate.
Core Features: Some core features of r-multtest include various methods for adjusting p-values, including the Benjamini-Hochberg method, Bonferroni correction, and more. It also offers functions for calculating adjusted p-values, q-values, and performing multiple testing corrections.
General Tags: R Package, Multiple Testing, Statistical Analysis
